text: 3.25 Stt 12.3, 18.18, 22.18, Lom 9.4, 9.8, Gal 3.8, 3.26 Bɨ God gos ñek agñeb anɨb okok, ñapay tɨkel, tɨk dad amɨl tɨk dad amɨl tɨkel nɨm, nɨbi mɨdebɨm agak. Anɨb ak takaw nɨbop olap, God based Eblaham nop gɨnɨgayn agɨl takaw aglak agak. Nop takaw aglɨl agak, Ñapay nad tɨke, tɨk dad amɨl apɨl gɨl tɨkɨnɨgabal okok, olap yek nɨŋɨd, binɨb okok mɨdupsek kod mɨdtep gɨnɨgab agak.
